I live in Uvita, Costa Rica and had heard through a friend about Posada Natura. It is located about twenty minutes outside of Quepos in the small unpretentious village of Londres. The gated compound is geared for retreats and ceremonial events and includes a large greeting room, a dining room, a spacious elevated yoga deck and a temple. The main structure is perched on a hill overlooking the Rio Naranjo which is easily accessed by a set of stairs that lead down to a natural pool fed by the adjacent river. The architecture boasts vaulted ceilings that maximize the breezes flowing from the river. The extensive stone and slate work convey a clean and refreshingly cool atmosphere.
